sentence.Network_en: Scientists in the blimp did not see anything.

derivation.yuyuan_name: First World War (in sense 2): of uncertain origin . Sense 1derives from the character invented by cartoonist David Low, used in anti-German or anti-government drawings before and during the Second World War

encyclopedia.content: Helium Manned Non-rigid Airship This category of airship can be used for advertisement and propagation, air-photo, scientific test, tour and surveillance duties. Model CA-80 airship has been certified by the CAAC and granted a type design approval and certificate of airworthiness. Model CA-120 airship will be an improved modify of model CA-80 and, up till now, the largest Helium Manned Non-rigid

entry.def: A blimp is the same as an airship .

means.word_mean: 1. a small nonrigid airship used for observation or as a barrage balloon
